verbs.description: A staggering number of people [V: are] seeking safe haven in the U.S. while the Trump administration tries to keep them out .

A staggering number of people are seeking safe haven in the U.S. while [ARG0: the Trump administration] [V: tries] [ARG1: to keep them out] .
A staggering number of people are seeking safe haven in the U.S. while [ARG0: the Trump administration] tries to [V: keep] [ARG1: them] [ARG2: out] .
